text: Marcos Mundstock (25 May 1942 â€“ 22 April 2020) was an Argentine musician, writer and comedian. He is best known as a founding member of comedy musical group Les Luthiers. He was born in Santa Fe, Argentina. He became a Spanish citizen in 2012. Mundstock died of brain cancer on 22 April 2020 in Buenos Aires. He was 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine comedians Category:Argentine musicians Category:Argentine writers Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:People from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Spanish actors Category:Spanish musicians
title: Marcos Mundstock
